long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly store and manage your frequently used snippets.

Tired of constantly copying and pasting the same text over and over? With Infinity Clipboard, you can easily save your most-used text snippets with a simple key-value system, making them instantly accessible from anywhere in your browser.

Key Features:

- Quick Save: Add text snippets with a single click, storing them as key-value pairs for easy reference.

- Instant Access: Access your saved snippets directly from the context menu, allowing you to paste them into any text field with ease.

- Organized Display: Your most recently saved snippets appear at the top, ensuring your latest entries are always within reach.

- Easy Management: Delete outdated snippets directly from the extension's popup interface to keep your list clean and up-to-date.

Whether you're a developer, writer, or anyone who frequently uses repetitive text, Infinity Clipboard is the perfect tool to boost your productivity.

Simplify your workflow with Infinity Clipboard – your new favorite clipboard manager!
